title: How to Cheat at Minesweeper

steps.headline: Randomly click around until you click a bomb.
steps.description: You should see the location of all of the bombs now.

steps.headline: Make sure nothing is blocking the minesweeper game window and press the screenshot button at the top left of the keyboard.
Click edit, then paste.
steps.description: You should see the screen of your lost minesweeper game.

steps.headline: Restart the same minesweeper game you just lost.
steps.description: There you go. you have the location to all of the mines in paint. This might take the fun out of the game, but at least you could win once.

text: Open up minesweeper.  Randomly click around until you click a bomb. You should see the location of all of the bombs now. Make sure nothing is blocking the minesweeper game window and press the screenshot button at the top left of the keyboard. It says Prt Scr SysRq. Open up the paint program.  Click edit, then paste. You should see the screen of your lost minesweeper game. Restart the same minesweeper game you just lost. There you go. you have the location to all of the mines in paint. This might take the fun out of the game, but at least you could win once.
